review: I use it in my daughter's playroom connected to her TV and it performs just as expected. It is not as fast as the bigger products but performs remarkably for being so small. Everything I want is on this product and my 3 year old daughter can easily utilize this controller to put on a program she wants to watch. We got rid of cable a couple of years ago and I had been using a Roku and did not like it at all. It was much slower then this and froze alot. Thank you Amazon for making an inexpensive way for watching prime, netflix, and hulu without frustrating me or my daughter from being slow or freezing.
